name: Baby Grenade
description:
___ STORY___

After a lifetime of hardcore gaming and billion hours of anime watching, you kept your virginity intact!

For how long can your donger remain untouched?

___ INSTRUCTIONS___

SURVIVE THE BABY GRENADE ARENA

___ CONTROLS___

AWSD to Navigate LEFT MOUSE BUTTON throws Babies

___ HOW TO LOSE___

Let them fool around with your clarinet

___ HOW TO WIN___

Everybody loses in the game of love
